data.title: Community :: Demographics for Lafayette
data.meta_description: Local demographics for Tippecanoe County and Lafayette - West Lafayette, Indiana
data.text:
Demographics

POPULATION

via US Census Bureau (2023)

Tippecanoe County: 188,792

Lafayette: 71,216

West Lafayette: 44,829

Purdue Enrollment Fall 2023: 52,211

Ivy Tech Enrollment (2023/24): 11,482

LOCATION

To and From: 60 Miles Northwest of Indianapolis

120 Miles Southeast of Chicago

Longitude: 86 52’ W

Latitude: 40 21’ N Elevation: 616 ft.

Adjacent counties

* White County (north)

* Carroll County (northeast)

* Clinton County (east)

* Montgomery County (south)

* Fountain County (southwest)

* Warren County (west)

* Benton County (northwest)

CLIMATE

Normal Temperatures:

Climate Mean Annual Temperature 50.0 degrees F

January Normal Daily Minimum 14.4 degrees F

January Normal Daily Maximum 31.5 degrees F

July Normal Daily Minimum 62.0 degrees F

July Normal Daily Maximum 84.5 degrees F

Time Zone Observed: Eastern Standard

CITIES and TOWNS in TIPPECANOE COUNTY

Incorporated;

Battle Ground, Clarks Hil, Dayton, Lafayette, Shadeland, Otterbein, West Lafayette
